replies.body: Plz Rito, Bring back URF {{item:3070}}
# BringBackURF2K15
PLEASE BRING BACK URF I DIDNT GET TO PLAY IT TT^TT {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3151}}
URF URF URF URF URF URF!!!!
Dont play league if they dont bring back URF!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
**PlzBringUrfBackDidn'tGetToPlay**
Yes. We want URF
RITO PLS ITS ALMOST APRIL FOOLS AGAIN
URF is comong back if you look at the league of legends wiki and type summoners icon there will be new icons called angel urf, smite from above and etc
We wants it... We needs it.. Must have URF!!
BRING BACK URF 2K15
"Bring Back Urf" - Quote Everyone, Forever{{item:3070}}
Imagine everyone was the same champion on the twisted treeline with a giant poro against ascended doom bots that have 80% CDR
That is a nightmare{{champion:56}}
SWEET MOTHER OF CHRIST. I'd pay money to watch people play that. *WATCH ONLY.*
Need URF back so bad, Please make it a weekly gamemode release like Twisted Treeline. It would increase gameplay tenfold, Cuz i remember my friends quitting league after URF mode was closed down.

ONE FOR ALL: URF EDITION!!!

Rito pls
That would be so {{champion:76}}fect
{{champion:17}} Hut two three four, just a little Saten (Welcome to Hell)
RIOT PLZ bring back urf just have a fun week or month when all the old game modes were put into custom games it would just be so funny the {{champion:268}} river dance would be real.
{{champion:432}} tunnel in URF <3
We Dont care about everything else. WE WANT URF!!! {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Bring back URF !! PLEASE {{item:3070}}
Ever since URF came out, no game mode has been able to best it. If urf was brought back, Or any ol game mode we know and love, I'd probably {{item:3070}} with joy!
BRING BACK URF PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE{{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}}

URF needs to be available ALL the time. Hexa:TT fun, Ascension was great too and Poro King was a good spin on Howling. But considering Oceanic only gets Twisted Treeline once a month I'm not holding my breath til they bring any of these back...{{item:3151}}
BIRNG URF BACK OR RITO
Let URF be permanent or atleast leave it as a permenant option for custom games
**BRING BACK URF!!! BEST GAMEMODE EVA PLS RITO {{item:3070}}**

I wish it were possible to just access any of the fun game modes in a custom game at all times.

or like, being able to alter the settings for the game for fun.
kinda like what you could do with Halo custom games or Smash bros, 
You want to double every ones movement speed? hell yeah, wanna increase damage from everything by 30%? why not. Want to take away cool downs on spells all together, ell yeah.
one day we might have customizable  games. :/
yes Urf is coming back and the other game mode : ) im so happy
That's fine riot, I must have made up snowdown showdown in my head
in 2014, yes snowdown showdown is in your head
How about we have a ranked ARAM  {{summoner:14}}

I honestly don't get why we cnt have urf like TT available weekly or at least permanently available in customs? Like with dominion but nonone likes dominion... c'mon rito listen to your players plsssssssss{{item:3070}}
A gamemode where you can have 12 items in your inventory heheheh
Call it BackPackers or somthing
BRING BACK URF!{{item:3151}}

please make a gamemode where you only have 2 abbilities but 80% cooldown
{{champion:13}}
i dig URF {{champion:421}}
URF PLZ {{champion:157}} {{summoner:11}} {{item:3087}}

I actually really enjoyed ascension, a game mode where you couldn't fall behind  in gold or exp. Every fight you would fight on more or less even terms and wasn't running at the enemy like aram{{summoner:31}}. also {{champion:55}} needs an energy bar
If {{champion:55}} got an energy bar it'd completely ruin her
The whole point of it. It is quite OP that a champ this bursty doesn't have mana constraints. Imagine Cass without mana, and times it by two. That's how OP Kat is atm

If they gave Kat an energy bar, they would have to give her a big energy regain on her passive, otherwise it would completely kill her kit, she is completely based around getting resets, stop her from resetting and its over for her.
^^ learn to play against a kat man
{{item:3070}}  Bring me back D: {{item:3070}}
please bring back urf and it should stay there and not leave{{champion:157}}
Please bring back urf rito <3 I will love  you so much
